body_html:
It should only be disabled for manual runs of //tensorflow/...
All internal automated systems should still run this test.

The motivation to drop SSE4.1 is #6809, AMD CPUs do not have SSE4.1.
But I think by dropping SSE4.1, we are dropping all previous versions of SSE too, and thus breaking this test?

It should only be disabled for manual runs of //tensorflow/...
All internal automated systems should still run this test.
The motivation to drop SSE4.1 is #6809, AMD CPUs do not have SSE4.1.
But I think by dropping SSE4.1, we are dropping all previous versions of SSE too, and thus breaking this test?
body:
It should only be disabled for manual runs of `//tensorflow/...`
All internal automated systems should still run this test.

The motivation to drop SSE4.1 is #6809, AMD CPUs do not have SSE4.1.
But I think by dropping SSE4.1, we are dropping all previous versions of SSE too, and thus breaking this test?
